= Compile skulls3d =

You need:
 * The [http://www.libsdl.org/ SDL], as of 2010-02, the latest development version is 1.2.14-VC8 ([http://www.libsdl.org/release/SDL-devel-1.2.14-VC8.zip download]).
 * [http://code.google.com/p/swegl/ swegl], the 3D software renderer.


The source tree should look like this:
{{{
mycode/swegl/
            /main.cpp
            /...
      /SDL/
          /lib
          /...
      /skulls3d/
               /projects
               /...
}}}
